    CompactContainer Class

    The CompactContainer class is used to create compact groups of widgets, like the playback buttons container. More...

    Header: #include <CompactContainer>
    • List of all members, including inherited members

    Public Functions

    CompactContainer(QWidget *parent = nullptr)
    void addWidget(QWidget *widget)
    QHBoxLayout *getLayout()

    Protected Functions

    void fixWidgetStyles()

    Detailed Description

    The CompactContainer class is used to create compact groups of widgets, like the playback buttons container.

    Member Function Documentation

    CompactContainer::CompactContainer(QWidget *parent = nullptr)

    Default constructs an instance of CompactContainer.

    void CompactContainer::addWidget(QWidget *widget)

    Inserts the widget to the last position of the container from left to right.

    [protected] void CompactContainer::fixWidgetStyles()

    Assign the correct class style to each widget, in order to make the corners round.

    QHBoxLayout *CompactContainer::getLayout()

    Returns the container's layout.
